name: AddressWhitelist
description: A contract to track a whitelist of addresses.

eventDecorators.name: AddedToWhitelist
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when pendingAdmin is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when pendingAdmin is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

eventDecorators.name: RemovedFromWhitelist
eventDecorators.description: Event emitted when pendingAdmin is changed. Emitted when a new `addr` is whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: addToWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Adds an address to the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: getWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Gets all addresses that are currently included in the whitelist. Note: This method skips over, but still iterates through addresses. It is possible for this call to run out of gas if a large number of addresses have been removed. To reduce the likelihood of this unlikely scenario, we can modify the implementation so that when addresses are removed, the last addresses in the array is moved to the empty index.

returnDecorators.name: activeWhitelist
returnDecorators.description: the list of addresses on the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: isOnWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Checks whether an address is on the whitelist.

returnDecorators.description: True if `elementToCheck` is on the whitelist, or False.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeFromWhitelist
functionDecorators.description: Removes an address from the whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
